name: SplitScreen Co-op
description: Two player co-op with splitscreen for the base game, or up to four players sharing two cameras if using Jolly Co-op.<LINE><LINE>Supports players splitting up far away and sleeping in different shelters (not fully supported if using Jolly). Currently, both players will still wake up in the same shelter.<LINE><LINE>Planned features:<LINE>- Saving in different shelters<LINE>- Collor picker for player 2<LINE>- 3 and 4 way split<LINE><LINE>Special thanks to:<LINE>- Intikus, helped with the trailer<LINE>- NoirCatto
